virtual wxWebUpdateCheckFlag wxWebUpdatePackage::Check (  const wxVersion &  localversion  )  const [virtual]
 

Checks if the webserver holds a more recent version of the given package.

This function never returns the wxWUCF_NOTINSTALLED symbol since it's assumed that the version you give is the version of the same package installed on the user's PC.

Parameters:
strURL The URL of the XML file stored in the web server which holds the informations to parse.
version The string version of the package which is being tested.
packagename The name of the package whose version must be tested.

static bool wxWebUpdatePackage::ExtractVersionNumbers (  const wxVersion &  str,
int *  maj,
int *  min,
int *  rel
)  [static]
 

Returns in the given int* the parsed version numbers of the given wxVersion.

wxString wxWebUpdatePackage::GetDescription (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the description for this package.

wxWebUpdateDownload & wxWebUpdatePackage::GetDownload (  wxWebUpdatePlatform  plat = wxWUP_INVALID  )  const [virtual]
 

Returns a reference to the download package for the given platform code.

In each package it should exist only a single download for each platform so the returned object should be the only item which is designed for the given platform.

int wxWebUpdatePackage::StdVersionCheck (  int  maj1,
int  min1,
int  rel1,
int  maj2,
int  min2,
int  rel2
)  [static]
 

Returns 1 when the package 1 is more updated than package 2 0 when the package 1 has the same version of package 2 -1 when the package 1 is older than package 2.

friend class wxWebUpdateXMLScript [friend]
 

Member Data Documentation

wxWebUpdateDownloadArray wxWebUpdatePackage::m_arrWebUpdates [protected]
 

The array containing all the webupdate downloads available for this package.

(Each download is for the same version of this package but for a different platform).

wxWebUpdatePackageImportance wxWebUpdatePackage::m_importance [protected]
 

The importance level of this package.

wxString wxWebUpdatePackage::m_strDescription [protected]
 

The description for this package.

wxString wxWebUpdatePackage::m_strID [protected]
 

The ID/name of this package. This must be unique in each XML webupdate script.

wxVersion wxWebUpdatePackage::m_strLatestVersion [protected]
 

The version of the downloads available for this package; i.e.

the latest version available on the webserver. This is stored as a wxVersion so that it's easy to override the Check functions and use another parser (rather than ExtractVersionNumbers) to do the check.

wxString wxWebUpdatePackage::m_strPrerequisites [protected]
 

The comma separed list of prerequisites for this package.

This list should contain only the IDs of other existing packages.
